summary: Dimwitted Martians drop into a little Illinois town on the day that the local radio station happens to rebroadcast Orson Welles 1938 "War Of The Worlds".
cast: Douglas Barr|Royal Dano|Ariana Richards|J.J. Anderson|Gregg Berger|Wayne Alexander|Fred Applegate|Patrika Darbo|Tonya Williams|Ryan Todd|Barry O'Neill|Adam Hansley|Casey Sander|Rose Parenti|Glen Vernon|Hal Riddle|William Holmes|James Eustermann|Justine L. Henry|Kent Minault|Kevin Thompson|Jimmy Briscoe|Tony Cox|Debbie Lee Carrington|Tommy Madden|Jeff Winkless|Bruce Lanoil|Joe Alaskey|Tony Pope|Patrick Read Johnson|Kirk R. Thatcher|Patrick Brock|Frank Woods
title: Locos invasores del espacio
